DOC.brief_summary: This randomise , double blind , placebo-controlled , 2-parts study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics single repeat inhaled dos GSK233705 novel dry powder device healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study GSK233705 Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Japanese healthy male subject age 20 64 year age inclusive . Healthy subject define individual free clinically significant illness disease determine medical history , physical examination , laboratory study , test . 2 . Body weight ≥ 50kg BMI within range 18.5025.00kg/m2 inclusive . 3 . Nonsmokers ( never smoke smoking > 6 month < 10 pack year history ( Pack year = ( cigarette per day smoked/20 ) x number year smoke ) ) 4 . Normal spirometry ( FEV1 ≥ 80 % predict , FEV1/FVC ≥ 70 % ) . 5 . Clinical laboratory test data obtain screen meet following : AST ( GOT ) , ALT ( GPT ) , totalbilirubin : upper limit normal range 6 . Normal 12lead EGC find screening ; QTc interval < 450msec 7 . A mean blood pressure low 140/90mmHg screening . 8 . Capable give write informed consent , include compliance requirement restriction list consent form . 9 . Capable use novel dry powder inhaler . 1 . The subject clinically relevant abnormality medical examination , vital sign , clinical laboratory test medical history screen medical opinion investigator subject medical history consider eligible inclusion study investigator . 2 . The subject currently participate another clinical study postmarketing study subject expose investigational noninvestigational drug device . 3 . The subject participate clinical study investigational noninvestigational drug device previous 4 month . 4 . A history breathing problem ( i.e . history asthmatic symptomatology , asthma childhood ) . 5 . The subject know allergy hypersensitivity ipratropium bromide , tiotropium , atropine derivative . 6 . The subject know allergy hypersensitivity milk protein excipients lactose monohydrate magnesium stearate . 7 . The subject history current condition drug abuse alcoholism . 8 . History regular alcohol consumption exceed average , 14 drinks/week ( 1 drink=5 ounce ( 150mL ) wine 350mL beer 1.5 ounce ( 45mL ) 80 proof distil spirit ) within 6 month screening . 9 . The subject positive urine drug screening . 10 . The subject positive syphilis , HBs antigen , HCV antibody , HIV antibody , HTLV1 antibody . 11 . The subject donate unit blood `` > 400mL '' within previous 4 month `` > 200mL '' within previous 1 month .
